item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, April 20, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Which year: guess which year each photo was taken (92 points | 25 comments)
2. 100 Years to Solve an Integral (2020) (92 points | 17 comments)
3. Raspberry Pi Lidar Scanner (422 points | 122 comments)
4. Novel color via stimulation of individual photoreceptors at population scale (84 points | 36 comments)

6. Pretty State Machine Patterns in Rust (58 points | 22 comments)
7. Librarians are dangerous (490 points | 468 comments)
8. A unique sound alleviates motion sickness (134 points | 52 comments)
9. Layered Design in Go (50 points | 5 comments)
10. Android phones will soon reboot themselves after sitting unused for three days (326 points | 252 comments)
11. First baby born in UK to woman with transplanted womb (239 points | 237 comments)
12. Release: OLED Mode extension for Chrome (6 points | discuss)
13. Claude Code: Best practices for agentic coding (420 points | 188 comments)
14. Welcome to the Era of Experience [pdf] (67 points | 17 comments)
15. The AI skeptic's guide to AI collaboration (17 points | 12 comments)
16. Everyone knows your location, Part 2: try it yourself and share the results (120 points | 14 comments)
17. Eccfrog512ck2: An Enhanced 512-Bit Weierstrass Elliptic Curve [pdf] (19 points | 3 comments)
18. Ssl.com: DCV bypass and issue fake certificates for any MX hostname (182 points | 47 comments)
19. Electromagnetism as a Purely Geometric Theory (96 points | 30 comments)
20. The Web Is Broken – Botnet Part 2 (335 points | 205 comments)
21. The Icelandic Voting System (2024) (96 points | 77 comments)
22. Cache loop and memory loss in GPT – a user-side fix (tested with GPT itself) (7 points | discuss)
23. Don't force your kids to do math (137 points | 123 comments)
24. Silicon Valley crosswalk buttons apparently hacked to imitate Musk, Zuck voices (338 points | 104 comments)
25. Packing Input Frame Context in Next-Frame Prediction Models for Video Generation (243 points | 26 comments)
26. Monsky's Theorem (42 points | 11 comments)
27. Translate Fortran to C++ with AI and RAG (35 points | 33 comments)
28. The Art of Assembly Language (2010) (105 points | 16 comments)
29. An image of the Australian desert illuminates satellite pollution (113 points | 70 comments)
30. Restoring the Galaxian3 Theatre 6, 1992 six player arcade machine (207 points | 46 comments)
